summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons press release announcing the death of inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It states he was found unresponsive, life-saving measures were taken, he was transported to a hospital and pronounced dead.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate found unresponsive and later pronounced dead at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. He was under pretrial status after being indicted.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. Life-saving measures were initiated, he was transported to a hospital, and was subsequently pronounced dead.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
Local hospital (unspecified) in New York, New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019, at approximately 6:30 p.m.
He was transported to a local hospital and subsequently pronounced dead.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation was notified of his death.
Epstein was a 66-year-old male under pretrial status after being indicted.
The press release states no staff, other inmates, or the public were in danger.
